long_description: The Freestyle Kampus watch offers straightforward function in a minimalist and durable design-everything you need and nothing you don't for rugged, reliable timekeeping. Easy-to-read face features a date window, large numerals, luminescent hands and a ratcheted timing bezel. Button-operated backlight ensures readability in the dark. Polyurethane strap is comfortable and durable. The Freestyle Kampus watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Freestyle Kampus watch offers straightforward function in a minimalist and durable design-everything you need and nothing you don't for rugged, reliable timekeeping.
